content: पर्यस् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To throw or cast round, spread round, diffuse. {@--2@} To spread over, surround; ताम्रौष्ठपर्य स्तरुचः स्मितस्य <ls>Ku. 1. 44.</ls> {@--3@} To turn round; पर्यस्तविलोचनेन <ls>Ku. 3. 68</ls> {@--4@} To shed, throw down (as tears); <ls>R. 10. 75</ls>; <ls>Ms. 11. 184.</ls> {@--5@} To overturn, upset. {@--6@} To throw about; <ls>R. 18. 13</ls>; <ls n="R.">5. 49.</ls> {@--7@} To entrap, ensnare. {@--8@} To enclose.
